title: Role of the spark in an automobile engine

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the role of the spark from the spark plug in an automobile engine?

choices.label: The spark decreases the energy of activation for the slow step.
The spark supplies some of the energy of activation for the combustion reaction.
The spark provides a more favorable activated complex for the combustion reaction.
The spark provides the heat of vaporization for the volatile hydrocarbon.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
